statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -3 \\ -4 \\ 2 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 3 \\ -4 \\ 1 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -8 \\ -3 \\ -12 \\ 5 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 14 \\ 21 \\ 28 \\ -14 \\ 0 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
